plot: A mother returns from the dead to help her son, a surgeon, find a stone with magical powers before he is killed by a vicious Japanese gang, looking for the same stone.
title: Ghost Mom
plot_es: A mother returns from the dead to help her son, a surgeon, find a stone with magical powers before he is killed by a vicious Japanese gang, looking for the same stone.
plot_en: A mother returns from the dead to help her son, a surgeon, find a stone with magical powers before he is killed by a vicious Japanese gang, looking for the same stone.
